feature.name: Draconic Resilience
feature.shortDescription: As magic flows through your body, it causes physical traits of your dragon ancestors to emerge. At 1st level, your hit point maximum increases by 1 and increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level in this class. Additionally, parts of your skin are covered by a thin sheen of dragon-like scales. When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC equals 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

feature.name: Black Dragon Ancestor
feature.shortDescription: You have a Black Dragon ancestor, associated with Acid Damage. Whenever you make a Charisma check when interacting with dragons, your proficiency bonus is doubled if it applies to the check.

feature.name: Elemental Affinity
feature.shortDescription: When you cast a spell that deals damage of the type associated with your draconic ancestry, you can add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll of that spell.

feature.name: Sorcery Points
feature.extensionDescription: You have the ability to gain resistance to the damage type associated with your dragon ancestry.

action.name: Elemental Affinity
action.shortDescription: When you cast a spell that deals damage of the type associated with your draconic ancestry, you can spend 1 sorcery point to gain resistance to that damage type for 1 hour.

feature.name: Dragon Wings
feature.shortDescription: You gain the ability to sprout a pair of dragon wings from your back, gaining a flying speed equal to your current speed. You can create these wings as a bonus action on your turn. They last until you dismiss them as a bonus action on your turn. You can’t manifest your wings while wearing armor unless the armor is made to accommodate them, and clothing not made to accommodate your wings might be destroyed when you manifest them.

effect.name: Dragon Wings
effect.shortDescription: You have dragon wings sprouted from your back, gaining a flying speed equal to your regular speed. They last until you dismiss them as a bonus action on your turn.

feature.name: Sorcery Points
feature.extensionDescription: You can channel the dread presence of your dragon ancestor, causing those around you to become awestruck or frightened.

effect.name: Draconic Presence: $type
effect.actionDescription: As an action, you can spend 5 sorcery points to draw on this power and exude an aura of awe or fear (your choice) to a distance of 60 feet. For 1 minute or until you lose your concentration (as if you were casting a concentration spell), each hostile creature that starts its turn in this aura must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed (if you choose awe) or frightened (if you choose fear) until the aura ends.
effect.shortDescription: You exude an aura of $type to a distance of 60 feet. For 1 minute or until you lose your concentration (as if you were casting a concentration spell), each hostile creature that starts its turn in this aura must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed (if you chose awe) or frightened (if you chose fear) until the aura ends. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to your aura for 24 hours.
